title: Clark's Shoes 'Enjoy Every Step' font ID
content:
Hello,

I'm looking for a font ID on the rounded typewriter-y font used in the Clark's Shoes 'Enjoy Every Step' campaign.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110521102117im_/http:/typophile.com/files/enjoy_6470.jpg)
  
Identifont and MyFonts came up with Antique Central and 58 Rodeo. They're close but aren't rounded and lack the swashes. I thought that perhaps it was a custom job, but then I saw the second sample whilst browsing through a magazine. It looked close enough to suggest that this could be an actual font.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110521102117im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bliss_5755.jpg)
  
Any help gratefully appreciated.

Cheers,

Brumble.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [enjoy.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20110521102117/http:/typophile.com/files/enjoy.jpg) | 4.48 KB |
author: brumble

comments.content:
Miss Tiffany, I am indebted to you. I would never have found that.

Thank you.

Brumble.
